scenes.description: Takanashi Kiara performs her song 'Fever Night' at her 3D Birthday Concert.
MC segment where Kiara welcomes the audience and introduces Momosuzu Nene for a game of 'Idol Shiritori'.

subtitles.original: And this time I'm coming for blood
subtitles.english: And this time I'm coming for blood

subtitles.original: Be the last one to laugh when you're run out of breath catching up
subtitles.english: Be the last one to laugh when you're run out of breath catching up

subtitles.original: I'm a threat and a half baby you don't even know me at all
subtitles.english: I'm a threat and a half baby you don't even know me at all

subtitles.original: Na na na...
subtitles.english: Na na na...

subtitles.original: Ha yeah
subtitles.english: Ha yeah

subtitles.original: Woo...
subtitles.english: Woo...

subtitles.original: Cause feelings are temporary but broken hearts keep the scars for life
subtitles.english: Cause feelings are temporary but broken hearts keep the scars for life

subtitles.original: The darkness no longer scares me
subtitles.english: The darkness no longer scares me

subtitles.original: I'm chasing and hunting and this time I'm coming for blood
subtitles.english: I'm chasing and hunting and this time I'm coming for blood

subtitles.original: Be the last one to laugh when you're run out of breath catching up
subtitles.english: Be the last one to laugh when you're run out of breath catching up

subtitles.original: I'm a threat and a half baby you don't even know me at all
subtitles.english: I'm a threat and a half baby you don't even know me at all

subtitles.original: Na na na...
subtitles.english: Na na na...

subtitles.original: You don't even know me at all
subtitles.english: You don't even know me at all

subtitles.original: Na na na...
subtitles.english: Na na na...

subtitles.original: Yay! Thank you, thank you, thank you!
subtitles.english: Yay! Thank you, thank you, thank you!

subtitles.original: hololive EN -Myth- Takanashi Kiara
subtitles.english: hololive EN -Myth- Takanashi Kiara

subtitles.original: And well, welcome everybody first of all to my concert!
subtitles.english: And well, welcome everybody first of all to my concert!

subtitles.original: I hope you enjoyed the first two songs.
subtitles.english: I hope you enjoyed the first two songs.

subtitles.original: How was it? How was it? How was it?
subtitles.english: How was it? How was it? How was it?

subtitles.original: Thank you, thank you, thank you!
subtitles.english: Thank you, thank you, thank you!

subtitles.original: I hope I already got you hyped up. This is gonna be a really fun show.
subtitles.english: I hope I already got you hyped up. This is gonna be a really fun show.

subtitles.original: But a fun show also needs some special guests, some people to talk to,
subtitles.english: But a fun show also needs some special guests, some people to talk to,

subtitles.original: maybe some call-ins, some games.
subtitles.english: maybe some call-ins, some games.

subtitles.original: And don't worry, I got you covered. I have invited a very special friend
subtitles.english: And don't worry, I got you covered. I have invited a very special friend

subtitles.original: to play a very special game together with.
subtitles.english: to play a very special game together with.

subtitles.original: And my friend is none other than my ODENZ member,
subtitles.english: And my friend is none other than my ODENZ member,

subtitles.original: Nenechi!
subtitles.english: Nenechi!

subtitles.original: hololive 5th Generation Momosuzu Nene
subtitles.english: hololive 5th Generation Momosuzu Nene

subtitles.original: Yay! 聞こえますかー？
subtitles.english: Yaaay! Can you hear me?

subtitles.original: ハッピーバースデー、キアラちゃん！
subtitles.english: Happy birthday, Kiara-chan!

subtitles.original: ねねち！
subtitles.english: Nenechi!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！あ、そうだ、お誕生日だった。
subtitles.english: Thank you! That's right, it's my birthday,

subtitles.original: そうだ、そうだ、そうだ。
subtitles.english: I almost forgot,

subtitles.original: ねねち、英語で自己紹介お願いします。
subtitles.english: Nenechi, can you introduce yourself in English, please?

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Sure!

subtitles.original: hololive 5th Generation, Momosuzu Nene!
subtitles.english: hololive 5th Generation, Momosuzu Nene!

subtitles.original: Yay!
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you for coming!

subtitles.original: こちらこそありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thanks for having me!

subtitles.original: Thank you.
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: So Nenechi and I will be playing "Idol Shiritori"!
subtitles.english: So Nenechi and I will be playing "Idol Shiritori"!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、ねねちとはね、アイドルしりとりという私が考えた天才のゲームをやります。
subtitles.english: It's a brilliant game that I came up with,

subtitles.original: Yay! That's right! After all,
subtitles.english: Yay! That's right! After all,

subtitles.original: if I'm the top idol in hololive English,
subtitles.english: if I'm the top idol in hololive English,

subtitles.original: もちろん！
subtitles.english: Of course!

subtitles.original: then for hololive Japan, it would have to be Nenechi!
subtitles.english: then for hololive Japan, it would have to be Nenechi!

subtitles.original: あーありがとう！
subtitles.english: Gosh, thank you!

subtitles.original: Nenechi is hololive Japan's number one idol in my heart.
subtitles.english: Nenechi is hololive Japan's number one idol in my heart.

subtitles.original: So I thought that the following game would be very fitting.
subtitles.english: So I thought that the following game would be very fitting.

subtitles.original: So I thought of this game, the rules are the following.
subtitles.english: So I thought of this game, the rules are the following.

subtitles.original: First of all, the name is "Idol Shiritori".
subtitles.english: First of all, the name is "Idol Shiritori".

subtitles.original: The normal Shiritori works the following: I say a Japanese word,
subtitles.english: The normal Shiritori works the following: I say a Japanese word,

subtitles.original: and they usually are built up in syllables.
subtitles.english: and they usually are built up in syllables.

subtitles.original: So the syllable that it ends with, Nenechi will have to think of
subtitles.english: So the syllable that it ends with, Nenechi will have to think of

subtitles.original: a new word that starts with that syllable.
subtitles.english: a new word that starts with that syllable.

subtitles.original: And then we keep on connecting and connecting until someone makes a mistake
subtitles.english: And then we keep on connecting and connecting until someone makes a mistake

subtitles.original: or says a word that already has been said. But here is the twist:
subtitles.english: or says a word that already has been said. But here is the twist:

subtitles.original: we can only use idol words, or cute or girly words, feminine words.
subtitles.english: we can only use idol words, or cute or girly words, feminine words.

subtitles.original: So anything that's cutesy and idol-y.
subtitles.english: So anything that's cutesy and idol-y.

subtitles.original: Yeah, I think us two, we shouldn't have any issues with that.
subtitles.english: Yeah, I think us two, we shouldn't have any issues with that.

subtitles.original: うちらだったら問題ないよね、アイドルしりとり！
subtitles.english: Idol Shiritori should be a piece of cake for us, right?

subtitles.original: できるよ、できるよ！ I can! Okay!
subtitles.english: We can do it! I can! Okay!

subtitles.original: Okay, then let's give it a shot! ねねち準備OKかな？
subtitles.english: Okay, then let's give it a shot! Nenechi you ready?

subtitles.original: いよー！
subtitles.english: Ready!

subtitles.original: なるべくあの、早めのペースでやりましょう。
subtitles.english: Let's try to keep the pace up.

subtitles.original: Okay! All right!
subtitles.english: Okay! All right!

subtitles.original: よし、じゃあ始めよう！ スタート！
subtitles.english: Here we go! Start! Start!

subtitles.original: ドキドキ！
subtitles.english: doki-doki (exciting)

subtitles.original: き...キラキラ！
subtitles.english: ki...kira-kira (sparkling)

subtitles.original: ランデブー！
subtitles.english: randebu (rendezvous)

subtitles.original: ランデブー？
subtitles.english: randebu?
bu...bu...bu...

subtitles.original: ブーメラン！
subtitles.english: bu...buumeran (boomerang)

subtitles.original: ん、で終わったな！
subtitles.english: You said a word that ends in "n"!

subtitles.original: あ、そうだ。
subtitles.english: Oh right!

subtitles.original: ブブー！アウト！ねねちアウト！
subtitles.english: Bzzt! You lose! Nenechi you lose!

subtitles.original: あーしまった！ちょっと待って。
subtitles.english: Darn it! Hang on...

subtitles.original: もう一回やりたい、もう一回やりたいな。
subtitles.english: Gimme another chance! Come on!

subtitles.original: Round 1, I win! One point for Takanashi Kiara. Okay, okay, okay,
subtitles.english: Round 1, I win! One point for Takanashi Kiara. Okay, okay, okay,

subtitles.original: じゃああの、3ラウンドやりましょう。 Okay!
subtitles.english: then let's do three rounds. Okay!

subtitles.original: じゃあ次、ねねちから...
subtitles.english: Okay, you start, Nenechi,
